name: Simple Recursion
author: Kay Akashi
statement: Given a recursion rule $a_{n + 1} = pa_n + q$, where $a_1 = 1$, output the value of $a_X$ mod $(10^9 + 7)$ given $X$.
input:
The first line of input contains $2$ integers, $p$ and $q$.
The second line of input contains $1$ integer, $X$.
output: Output a single integer, the value of $a_X$ mod $(10^9 + 7)$.
